text: Ara amara kono rasula patha'i ni allah‌ra hukume tamdera anusarana karara jan'ye chara. Ara tara yadi, yakhana tara nijedera prati an'yaya karechila, takhana tomara kache asato o allah‌ra kache ksama prarthana karato, ara rasula'o yadi tadera jan'ye ksama ca'itena, tabe tara allah‌ke peto barabara pratyabartanakari, aphuranta phaladata.
